title: Фантастичні Українці
overview: FANTASTIC UKRAINIANS - a documentary project about modern Ukrainian culture. Each episode explores the national art context. Tells about the creation of an art product. About the breakthrough that is happening now in Ukrainian culture, our achievements and pain points. It is important for us to record how drastically our country has changed in recent years, to tell about people who give faith in the bright future of Ukraine, to make the viewer think about who we are and where we are going, what Ukrainian dream and what legacy we leave for future generations.The project is implemented with the support of the Ukrainian Cultural Foundation.
